title: "dont end"
body:
I want to win
I am hungry
I want to get on with the next game
We're obviously stomping right now
I'm ending the game. Don't tell me otherwise.

replies.body: 1. They have a {{champion:114}} /{{champion:11}} /{{champion:75}}  and i went through the fucking effort of making them utterly useless early and mid game so end the damn game before they hit their broken unkillable bruiser power spikes
{{champion:11}} {{item:3931}} {{item:3748}} Unkillable bruiser achieved

What's this? Bruiser {{champion:11}} is evolving!
 {{item:3053}} {{item:3124}} 
Congratulations! Your Bruiser {{champion:11}} evolved into Juggernaut {{champion:11}}!
gg
Enemy team: ~~i like shorts. They are comfy and easy to wear.~~ PRESS Z YOU PIECE OF S**t
my Melee Minion is in the top percent of melee minions!
http://i.imgur.com/H1ckNJd.png
Except unlike Dragonite, most Master Yi's are assholes
Stop
Aaaaaaand they won the game.

I hate it when people ask me not to end, to me it demonstrates a complete lack of empathy. If it's to the point where the game is obviously over, I don't ever see any point in drawing it out. It's not fair, and it's just bad sportsmanship.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Daguava,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=80K9ERTn,comment-id=0025,timestamp=2016-03-20T07:38:51.141+0000)
>
> I hate it when people ask me not to end, to me it demonstrates a complete lack of empathy. If it's to the point where the game is obviously over, I don't ever see any point in drawing it out. It's not fair, and it's just bad sportsmanship.

I had some asshole in a ranked match very nearly throw the match because rather than destroying the open nexus, he sat at their spawn platform and taunted while waiting to spawnkill. 

And nothing pisses me off more than seeing somebody say " gg ez " it's so fucking rude. Doesn't matter if it's their team or my team, it's really disrespectful.

There are only 2 times it is okay to say GG EZ.

1) You lost the game, and you say "GG EZ" as a joke.

2) An Ezreal player, either on your team or the enemy team, did well enough that you want to say "GG Ez."  (Though you shouldn't do this one because it will be misunderstood, haha.)
I secretly hope this is what people mean every time, and then there are no Ezreals :(
What do you mean there are no Ezreals? There's ALWAYS an Ezreal.
{{champion:44}}  Really?
oh dear god, NO taric, that log is not ezreal, put on your pants. you need to look good for your rework.

Rioter walking around the office*

Sees people fa(bb)ing to Taric rework*

http://i.imgur.com/t1O9YuS.png

Lol whenever my team gets absolutely dookied on, I make sure to say GG EZ, especially because most of the time I am losing like that I am sure to relieve my tilt by conversing and making jokes (not hurtful ones) to the other team about "lol whoopsi" whenever I die, and stuff like that, and mostly after each game I am honored for it lol
People who say this are jerks.

Nah, they are good guys, giving us the opportunity to ace their team in our base and demolish their nexus during the lategame death timers.  My favorite comebacks are after the enemy team has been snowballing and trash talking in all chat.
That is known as poetic justice, and it is smooth and satisfying. Like eating an Oreo :p

_Team is at enemy's fountain, they are all still down_

Someone: "heeeey guyz lets baron real kwik!"
Someone else: "hell ya!"
Someone 2: "BARON or REPORTED!!!"

_Whole team dies trying to baron, enemy team respawns, they win_
Sounds about right.

> [{quoted}](name=Hemulen Magi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=80K9ERTn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-19T04:32:02.127+0000)
>
> Nah, they are good guys, giving us the opportunity to ace their team in our base and demolish their nexus during the lategame death timers.  My favorite comebacks are after the enemy team has been snowballing and trash talking in all chat.

True, nothing more satisfying than the moment they stop all chatting their trash talk because they can't win the team fights. :3

"dont end"

Sounds like an entitled ADC needs to rack up kills before ending up having fewer kills than support.
Or the jungler wanting to accept the '1v1 me noob' by the underfed enemy top laner

So many times has people said

"This is a waste of time"
"Please just surrender, we can't win anyway"
"End or I afk"
"I have to go"

To these people I say... Quitting or surrendering only leads to one outcome no matter what: a loss. As opposed to actually trying which leads to either winning or losing. By all that is logic, surrendering is a flawed option in the first place.

Secondly, if you think you are wasting your time playing a game until the end, think about what you are doing right now... Playing a game is the pinnacle of wasting your time, how can anyone ever argue that lol.

I have seen my share of games where we thought all was lost and people raged until their team got too cocky and then we aced them, pushed back our lane, got some nice item, pull our heads out of our asses and won with a nice come back. You might think it's impossible but I've seen it happen to many time to just drop dead when I could still try and win this game. 

Remember, the only possible outcome for "not trying" is failing...as opposed to when someone actually try and has the possibility to win.

> [{quoted}](name=BibitteDeFou,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=80K9ERTn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-19T04:59:56.612+0000)
>
> So many times has people said
> 
> "This is a waste of time"
> "Please just surrender, we can't win anyway"
> "End or I afk"
> "I have to go"
> 
> To these people I say... Quitting or surrendering only leads to one outcome no matter what: a loss. As opposed to actually trying which leads to either winning or losing. By all that is logic, surrendering is a flawed option in the first place.
> 
> Secondly, if you think you are wasting your time playing a game until the end, think about what you are doing right now... Playing a game is the pinnacle of wasting your time, how can anyone ever argue that lol.
> 
> I have seen my share of games where we thought all was lost and people raged until their team got too cocky and then we aced them, pushed back our lane, got some nice item, pull our heads out of our asses and won with a nice come back. You might think it's impossible but I've seen it happen to many time to just drop dead when I could still try and win this game. 
> 
> Remember, the only possible outcome for "not trying" is failing...as opposed to when someone actually try and has the possibility to win.

I usually will only surrender if it is obvious my team is not even going to attempt to win.
Actually, it also leads to a shorter game. There is stuff to do *outside* of League of Legends, believe it or not.

> There is stuff to do outside of League of Legends, believe it or not.

No... LIES! THESE ARE LIES! 

THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE! 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MIZbGSXeWWE

>Playing a game is the pinnacle of wasting your time

truer words were never spoken

> [{quoted}](name=foinhas,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=80K9ERTn,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2016-03-19T09:01:18.539+0000)
>
> truer words were never spoken

Let me fix that for you, "Playing a game that you don't even enjoy/when you're not having fun is the pinnacle of wasting your time."

> [{quoted}](name=BibitteDeFou,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=80K9ERTn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-19T04:59:56.612+0000)
>
> So many times has people said
> 
> "This is a waste of time"
> "Please just surrender, we can't win anyway"
> "End or I afk"
> "I have to go"
> 
> To these people I say... Quitting or surrendering only leads to one outcome no matter what: a loss. As opposed to actually trying which leads to either winning or losing. By all that is logic, surrendering is a flawed option in the first place.
> 
> Secondly, if you think you are wasting your time playing a game until the end, think about what you are doing right now... Playing a game is the pinnacle of wasting your time, how can anyone ever argue that lol.
> 
> I have seen my share of games where we thought all was lost and people raged until their team got too cocky and then we aced them, pushed back our lane, got some nice item, pull our heads out of our asses and won with a nice come back. You might think it's impossible but I've seen it happen to many time to just drop dead when I could still try and win this game. 
> 
> Remember, the only possible outcome for "not trying" is failing...as opposed to when someone actually try and has the possibility to win.

I'm sorry, but if it's 40 minutes in, and the enemy team is up 3 barons, 5 Dragons, and the enemy top laner was in our base killing our inhibitor before the 20-minute mark, and you click "No" on that surrender vote, you are either griefing or retarded. Either way, you're getting a report.

There are plenty of reasons to evaluate a surrender vote and maybe consider a turnaround. However, knowing that you're only there because the enemy team doesn't want to finish is not a situation where you don't surrender. End the game. Click yes. Stop wasting my time.

The worst part is that with leaverbuster, you CAN'T just DC from the game. The rules force you to sit there for eternity waiting for minions to win because your team won't stop trying to clear out base and the enemy won't push. We need to put a stop to this nonsense. There needs to be a threshold where you've been in a game long enough and are allowed to DC without punishment.

I see posts like this and people complaining like their reports don't feel like they do anything and I just can't muster any sympathy at all. You're willingly trashing your report weight over surrender vote salt, that just doesn't make sense to me.

> [{quoted}](name=BibitteDeFou,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=80K9ERTn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-19T04:59:56.612+0000)

You might think it's impossible but I've seen it happen to many time to just drop dead when I could still try and win this game.

> Remember, the only possible outcome for "not trying" is failing...as opposed to when someone actually try and has the possibility to win.

What if the score is like 20 / 1 for them? You still wouldn't surrender? These kind of games are a colossal waste of time and are unwinnable.

I once won a game at 60 min because their entire team was too focused on kills to clear out the winions in their base. they killed us way too many times, but we still won because I, along with another person, voted no on the surrender option
This + when you have early game team and enemy have late game.

lol if the score is 3/35 imi going to ff and u cant tell me otherwise
i agree with this... if we are actually organized and have voice chat, but if its solo and we are getting stomped, its over.

15 minutes into an ARAM game, enemy team comp so OP inhibitor is down and they are at our nexus, not a single 1 of them is attacking the nexus or the towers and just throwing bullshit at us trying to kill us, I hate those games

dont end leme get ma penta

If you don't end, the opponent could win and you waste your time.
if you end, your teammates think you are an asshole.

Which is better?
To add to that: If you end, the enemy team definitely won't think you're an asshole.
Don't end.  I want to dance near their fountain, waiting for {{champion:53}} to hook me, my team get aced, and us end up losing.

that dont end crap should only be for AI games.
if you're seriously saying that crap in normals or ranked you need to get slapped and then blocked.
Upvoted for food:DDD

But I want that 50 gold for an item.
My needs over yours.

I had 2 People on my team (different game different person) that said "Don't end, No need to rush this"

When I saw this here was my reaction, and probably everyone else's too: whaAT TH FUCK DO YOU MEANROGWIORHGOVEPRG

We lost both games because of them by the way.
